title: How do you buy region swaps on new client?
body: It used to be next to name change but now it's not? Can't find it anywhere else on the client. Although, i am still installing the client so maybe for whatever reason, it's just not showing yet?

replies.body: [Region swaps are disabled until November 21st in preparation for end of season. ](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/eylRc8AL-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st)
